mints.name: Royal Mint London
mints.notes: Struck Canada's first decimal coins in 1858

mints.name: Ottawa Mint
mints.notes: Became Royal Canadian Mint in 1969. Primary facility for circulation coins.

mints.name: Winnipeg Mint
mints.notes: High-volume production facility. Annual capacity ~1 billion coins.

mints.name: Ottawa Mint (British Sovereigns)
mints.notes: Special mint mark 'C' used on British sovereigns struck in Ottawa
